main event: Two objects were detected on ground radar and observed visually in Derry, Massachusetts, on April 6, 1961.
interesting points: The objects were first detected on ground radar at 0521 EDT and tracked for about 3 minutes., They appeared circular, emitted visible light, and were very large., The objects flew silently and at high speed before dispersing into smaller objects., The case involves both radar confirmation and visual observation., The sighting is documented as interesting and well-substantiated.
sighted object: two large circular objects with visible light
